name: Economy
details: In this economy package you will get a Senior photographer and a Cinematographer to fulfill your needs, with full light setup and unlimited photos (all post processed). The video quality will be full HD. You will have the photos and the videos in a DVD. 50 special edited photo, 1.00-2.30 minute’s promo of full event and 50 printed photos (4R). Working duration will be 5 hours.

name: Basic Pack
details: In this basic package you will get two Senior photographer and a Cinematographer to fulfill your needs, with full light setup and unlimited photos (all post processed). The video quality will be full HD. You will have the photos and the videos in a DVD. 50 special edited photo, 2.00-2.30 minute’s promo of full event and 50 printed photos (4R). Working duration will be 5 hours.

name: Standard Pack
details: In this standard package you will get two Senior photographer and two Cinematographer to fulfill your needs, with full light setup and unlimited photos (all post processed). name: Premium Pack
details: In this premium package you will get two Senior photographers, three top photographers, 1 senior cinematographer and two top Cinematographer to fulfill your needs, with full light setup and unlimited photos (all post processed). The video quality will be full HD. You will have the photos and the videos in a DVD. 50 special edited photo, 2.00-2.30 minute’s promo of full event and 50 printed photos (4R). name: Signature Pack
details: 2 Hours Exclusive Photoshoot of Bride and Groom. In this signature package you will get two Senior photographer and two Cinematographer to fulfill your needs, with full light setup and unlimited photos (all post processed). The video quality will be full HD. You will have the photos and the videos in a DVD. 50 special edited photo, 2.00-2.30 minute’s promo of full event and 50 printed photos (4R). name: Story Telling Pack
details: FOR THREE EVENTS. In this story telling package you will get two Senior photographer, two top photographers, one senior cinematographer and two top Cinematographer to fulfill your needs, with full light setup and unlimited photos (all post processed). The video quality will be full HD. You will have the photos and the videos in a DVD. 50 special edited photo (per day), 2.00-2.30 minute’s promo of full event and 50 printed photos (4R) (per day). Working duration will be 5 hours.
